i'm 24 so i was just a kid back then but this was the very first cassette tape I ever purchased. I still have it and I don't have a set up cassette player in the house. 

Foo Fighters are cool too. ytube the song Razor. It's a b-side, so not too popular / available but your eye's will probably get wet and you might have a lump in your throat. Good song, probably not really popular because of the subject.

Thanks for the upload textream. This album is in the top 5 on my greatest albums of my life list. I appreciate you taking the time to upload this. You made my day. This album is up there with Pink Floyd's The Wall.
thanks for the upload. you know that baby on the cover of nevermind is like 23 now....
